sections.heading: Budget Act; not applicable; when
sections.text: The Nebraska Budget Act shall not apply to any good life district economic development program or local sources of revenue dedicated to such program.SourceLaws 2024, LB1317, ยง 10.Cross ReferencesNebraska Budget Act, see section 13-501.

77-4417.Nebraska Budget Act; not applicable; when.

The Nebraska Budget Act shall not apply to any good life district economic development program or local sources of revenue dedicated to such program.

SourceLaws 2024, LB1317, ยง 10.

Cross ReferencesNebraska Budget Act, see section 13-501.
